name: rangebounddatepicker-control
description: RangeBoundDatePicker Power Apps component framework control.

scripts.pack: npm run sync:version && npm run pack:unmanaged && npm run pack:managed
scripts.pack:managed: mkdir -p dist && dotnet msbuild solution/solution.cdsproj /restore /p:SolutionPackageType=Managed && node scripts/copy-solution-package.js managed
scripts.pack:unmanaged: mkdir -p dist && dotnet msbuild solution/solution.cdsproj /restore /p:SolutionPackageType=Unmanaged && node scripts/copy-solution-package.js unmanaged
